<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mummy's Despair](/Feats.aspx?ID=3524) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Mummy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=180)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Mummy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3520)

</column>

---

You force your mental anguish outward, projecting it upon those around you. You gain an aura of despair in a 30-foot emanation lasting 5 rounds. A creature that enters or begins its turn in the aura must succeed at a Will save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC or be [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure). A creature that succeeds at the save is temporarily immune to Mummy's Despair for 10 minutes.

<title level="2">Mummy's Despair leads to...</title>
[Greater Despair](/Feats.aspx?ID=3531)
name: Mummy's Despair
